title: #200: The War On Everything
description:
If there is one thing that people can trust, it’s that when the Government gets involved with a situation, the situation is about to get a whole lot worse. And when a government declares a “WAR” on an idea, well, get ready to see criminality in full swing.

One might think that after the long line of Government failures in the past, they might stop engaging in nonsensical wars against inanimate objects, invisible enemies, and concepts. Well in America, that has never stopped the Government from giving it another uncalibrated shot...while systematically removing additional rights from the people in the process.

Be it COVID, Terror, Crime, Climate Change, Drugs, or Poverty, one thing is for certain: when the American government steps in to “solve” the problem, that is the beginning of a slew of even more problems in their wake.
